title: Portrait of Sunrise
overview: In this stylish vid, art students sketching a nude Sunrise Adams are assigned by instructor Lee Stone to imagine where they would see her in their real lives. Randy Spears sees her in a strip club, Nakita Kash sees her during a self-abuse session in her own bed, Evan Stone and Nikki Fairchild fuck on a desk just for variety, and Sunrise and Lee Stone perform a "bodies in motion" pas de deux for the art class for a finish.  Director La Rue brings an interesting perspective to the sex scenes, with odd angles and active camerawork the rule rather than the exception, and music and transitions by edit rather than by repositioning on camera. La Rue also adds an element of tease that gets enthusiastic performances from veteran performers who have, let's face it, done this before.
